verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> lech Depart עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh [and] go up מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh, here אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְהָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am, hence thou and the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הֶֽעֱלִ֖יתָ <WH5927> he-'e-Li-ta which thou hast brought up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, unto the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher of which נִ֠שְׁבַּעְתִּי <WH7650> Nish-ba'-ti which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> u-le-ya-'a-Ko and to Jacob לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> le-zar-'a-Cha Unto thy seed אֶתְּנֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5414> 'et-te-Nen-nah. will I give

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֥י <WH7971> ve-sha-lach-Ti And I will send לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha before מַלְאָ֑ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach; an angel וְגֵֽרַשְׁתִּ֗י <WH1644> ve-ge-rash-Ti, thee and I will drive out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanite הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, the Amorite וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> ve-ha-chit-Ti and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi, and the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusite

אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz Unto a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> za-Vat flowing חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> u-de-Vash; and honey כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki because לֹ֨א <WH3808> lo I will not אֶֽעֱלֶ֜ה <WH5927> 'e-'e-Leh for I will not go up בְּקִרְבְּךָ֗ <WH7130> be-kir-be-Cha, in the midst כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki because עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֙רֶף֙ <WH6203> 'o-ref stiff-necked אַ֔תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah, and I פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- might אֲכֶלְךָ֖ <WH3615> 'a-chel-Cha lest I consume בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> bad-Da-rech. thee in the way

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah, came כְּצֵ֤את <WH3318> ke-Tzet went out מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And it came to pass when Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel, unto the tabernacle יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6965> ya-Ku-mu rose up כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, [that] all the people וְנִ֨צְּב֔וּ <WH5324> ve-Nitz-tze-Vu, and stood אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach door אָהֳל֑וֹ <WH168> o-ho-Lo; [at] his tent וְהִבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <WH5027> ve-hib-Bi-tu and looked אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּא֖וֹ <WH935> bo-'O until he was gone הָאֹֽהֱלָה׃ <WH168> ha-'O-he-lah. into the tabernacle
